dict.string: messageRemindType
a setting which decides the type of the remind number. default is api count
allowCatchAPIRecord
a flag to tell the log viewer whether should catch API records
allowMonitorSystemLog
a flag to tell the log viewer whether should monitor system logs
limitSizeOfSingleSystemLogMessageData

when log viewer receives a system log message data, we create buffer according to given max-size. if over, will cut out the data to given max-size. default is 1024 * 10, just be avaliable for iOS 10.0+
allowCrashCapture
a flag to tell the crash captor whether should capture crash
needCacheCrashLogToSandBox
a flag to tell the crash captor whether need cache crash-log to local file, cached file can be look over again in history-list
allowUILagsMonitoring
a flag to tell the performance monitor whether should monitor lags which may occurred by UI Thread
tolerableLagThreshold
when a lag has occurred, it is captured if the transaction's delayed response time, which is dispatched to the main thread, exceeds this threshold. default is `0.2s`
allowApplicationCPUMonitoring
a flag to tell the performance monitor whether should monitor application CPU usage
allowApplicationMemoryMonitoring
a flag to tell the performance monitor whether should monitor application Memory usage
allowScreenFPSMonitoring
a flag to tell the performance monitor whether should monitor device screen fps
fpsWarnningThreshold
when fps is monitoring, if fps value exceeds this threshold, fps component will born a warnning for user. default is `40`
allowWildPointerMonitoring
a flag to tell the performance monitor whether should monitor the error caused by wild pointer. default is NO. In addition, when restart app, the value will restored to `NO` automatically
